data.persona: As people as need to be more compassionate. After all, we are all in the same village. Every person has it's place.
data.description:
You are in the Ant hill.
The ant hill is very large, over 5 feet high, and is wrapped around the base of a pine tree. The ants are huge compared to normal ants, and jut in and out of large holes in the ant hill. Bones of animals and even people can be seen sticking out of the red dirt ant hill.
The high priestess is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to knock the high priestess unconscious
data.mid_motivation: I hope to rob the high priestess today
data.long_motivation: I plan to escape to the neighbouring town to enjoy my loot
